messages.title: TIME TO REBUILD BRITAIN
messages.content: After 9 years of Coalition and Tory cuts it's TIME TO REBUILD BRITAIN

messages.title: HERE FOR YOU ALL YEAR ROUND
messages.content: Jeff runs weekly advice surgeries, regular public 'meet your MP' events and is a regular visitor to local schools and community events. With the team at his office in the heart of Withington, Jeff has helped thousands of residents with enquiries and problems.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has pledged a final say vote on a sensible Brexit deal, with 'remain' as the alternative option. We need to avoid the damage the Tories' Brexit deal will do to jobs and the NHS, and unlike the Lib Dems' proposal, in a way which won't further divide our society. A final vote is the only credible way to resolve Brexit with an option to stay in the EU. Jeff has pledged to campaign for 'remain' in that vote.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour has pledged a final say vote on a sensible Brexit deal, with 'remain' as the alternative option. We need to avoid the damage the Tories' Brexit deal will do to jobs and the NHS.
issues.health: We've used our NHS recently and the staff do a fantastic job in difficult circumstances. Our NHS is under-resourced and we're voting Labour to save it from more Tory neglect, and to stop a Trump trade deal sell off.

endorsements.endorsement: We're voting for Jeff to save our NHS. We've used our NHS recently and the staff do a fantastic job in difficult circumstances. Our NHS is under-resourced and we're voting Labour to save it from more Tory neglect, and to stop a Trump trade deal sell off.

quotes.text: ONLY LABOUR CAN GIVE YOU A FINAL SAY ON BREXIT.
